verses.verse: Moreover the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H5375>lifted<s%> me up, and <S%H935>brought<s%> me to the <S%H6931>east<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> which <S%H6437>looks<s%> <S%H6921>eastward:<s%> and <S%H2009>behold<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H376>men;<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> whom I <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H2970>Jaazaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5809>Azur,<s%> and <S%H6410>Pelatiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1141>Benaiah,<s%> <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he to me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H582>men<s%> that <S%H2803>devise<s%> <S%H205>mischief,<s%> and give <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H6098>counsel<s%> in <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city:<s%>
Which <S%H559>say,<s%> It is not <S%H7138>near;<s%> let us <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1004>houses:<s%> <S%H1931>this<s%> city is the <S%H5518>caldron,<s%> and we be the <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>
<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them, <S%H5012>prophesy,<s%> O <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man.<s%>

And the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on me, and <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H559>Speak;<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H3651>Thus<s%> have you <S%H559>said,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> for I <S%H3045>know<s%> the things that <S%H4609>come<s%> into your <S%H7307>mind,<s%> every one of them.
You have <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> your <S%H2491>slain<s%> in <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and you have <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H2351>streets<s%> thereof with the <S%H2491>slain.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> Your <S%H2491>slain<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you have <S%H7760>laid<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of it, they are the <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and <S%H1931>this<s%> city is the <S%H5518>caldron:<s%> but I will <S%H3318>bring<s%> you <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of it.
You have <S%H3372>feared<s%> the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> on you, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

And I will <S%H3318>bring<s%> you out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> thereof, and <S%H5414>deliver<s%> you into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H2114>strangers,<s%> and will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> among you.

You shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> you in the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H1931>This<s%> city shall not be your <S%H5518>caldron,<s%> neither shall you be the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> thereof; but I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> you in the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%>

And you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> for you have not <S%H1980>walked<s%> in my <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H6213>executed<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> but have <S%H6213>done<s%> after the <S%H4941>manners<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> that are <S%H5439>round<s%> about you.

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when I <S%H5012>prophesied,<s%> that <S%H6410>Pelatiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> <S%H4191>died.<s%> Then <S%H5307>fell<s%> I down on my <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H2199>cried<s%> with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H162>Ah<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD!<s%> will you <S%H6213>make<s%> a full <S%H3615>end<s%> of the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>
Again the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> even your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of your <S%H1353>kindred,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3605>wholly,<s%> are they to <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> have <S%H559>said,<s%> Get you <S%H7368>far<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> to us is <S%H1931>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5414>given<s%> in <S%H4181>possession.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3588>Although<s%> I have <S%H7368>cast<s%> them <S%H7368>far<s%> off among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> and <S%H272>although<s%> I have <S%H6327>scattered<s%> them among the <S%H776>countries,<s%> yet will I be to them as a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> in the <S%H776>countries<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> they shall <S%H935>come.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> I will even <S%H6908>gather<s%> you from the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H622>assemble<s%> you out of the <S%H776>countries<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> you have been <S%H6327>scattered,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And they shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H8033>thither,<s%> and they shall <S%H5493>take<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8251>detestable<s%> things thereof and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> thereof from there.

And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> you; and I will <S%H5493>take<s%> the <S%H68>stony<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> out of their <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and will <S%H5414>give<s%> them an <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H1320>flesh:<s%>

That they may <S%H3212>walk<s%> in my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them: and they shall be my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and I will be their <S%H430>God.<s%>

But as for them whose <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H1980>walks<s%> after the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of their <S%H8251>detestable<s%> things and their <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> I will <S%H5414>recompense<s%> their <S%H1870>way<s%> on their own <S%H7218>heads,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

Then did the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H5375>lift<s%> up their <S%H3671>wings,<s%> and the <S%H212>wheels<s%> <S%H5980>beside<s%> them; and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was <S%H5921>over<s%> them <S%H4605>above.<s%>

And the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up from the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is on the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H6924>side<s%> of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

Afterwards the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H5375>took<s%> me up, and <S%H935>brought<s%> me in a <S%H4758>vision<s%> by the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> into <S%H3778>Chaldea,<s%> to them of the <S%H1473>captivity.<s%> So the <S%H4758>vision<s%> that I had <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up from me.
Then I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to them of the <S%H1473>captivity<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>things<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H7200>showed<s%> me.
